StringTable.Label: GAMETAG_SYNTAX_WITH_DESCRIPTION
StringTable.String: Some tags are simply the name of the tag in {}. Syntax: {GAMETAG} Example: "{PLANETNAME} is a great place to live!" Others have a : followed by a number which is the GameTextIndex, to differentiate between multiple possible replacements. In conversation flavor text, 1 is the Speaker (player initiating the conversation), 2 is the Listener (player receiving the conversation) and 3 is the Third Party Player (player the Speaker and Listener are conversing about). In conversations where someting is being offered, use the GameTextIndex to indicate who is giving the item (AMOUNT, TECHNAME, OBJECTNAME) Syntax: {GAMETAG:#} Example 1: "We, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} declare war on you, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}" Example 2: "The {PLAYERFACTION:3} are no more."
